developer/smart-contracts.title: Smart Contract Architecture
developer/smart-contracts.description: UrStake's smart contract system is built on Aptos Move, providing secure, efficient, and composable liquid staking infrastructure.

getting-started/first-stake.title: Your First Stake
getting-started/first-stake.description: This guide will walk you through making your first stake on UrStake. We'll cover both APT and USDC staking options.

getting-started/overview.title: Platform Overview
getting-started/overview.description: UrStake revolutionizes staking on the Aptos blockchain by providing liquid staking solutions that eliminate the traditional trade-off between earning rewards and maintaining liquidity.

getting-started/wallet-setup.title: Wallet Setup
getting-started/wallet-setup.description: To use UrStake, you'll need an Aptos-compatible wallet. This guide will help you set up and connect your wallet to the platform.

intro.title: Welcome to UrStake
intro.description: UrStake is the ultimate liquid staking platform on the Aptos blockchain, enabling users to stake their APT and USDC tokens while maintaining liquidity through tradeable staking derivatives.

support/contact.title: Contact & Support
support/contact.description: Get help from the UrStake team and community through our various support channels.

support/faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
support/faq.description: Get answers to the most common questions about UrStake's liquid staking protocol.

support/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting Guide
support/troubleshooting.description: Step-by-step solutions for common issues when using UrStake's liquid staking protocol.

user-guide/governance.title: Governance
user-guide/governance.description: Participate in UrStake's decentralized governance and help shape the future of liquid staking on Aptos.

user-guide/liquid-tokens.title: Liquid Tokens
user-guide/liquid-tokens.description: Understand how stAPT and stUSDC liquid staking tokens work and how to use them across the DeFi ecosystem.

user-guide/staking-apt.title: APT Staking Guide
user-guide/staking-apt.description: Stake your APT tokens with UrStake to earn rewards while maintaining liquidity through stAPT tokens.

user-guide/staking-usdc.title: USDC Staking Guide
user-guide/staking-usdc.description: Stake USDC with UrStake to earn stable yields while maintaining the full utility of your stablecoin holdings.

user-guide/unstaking.title: Unstaking Guide
user-guide/unstaking.description: Learn how to unstake your assets and convert liquid tokens back to the underlying assets when needed.
